meanings.definition: A verb form ending in -ing that functions as a noun.
meanings.sent1: Eating is a gerund that acts as a noun.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy swimming in the pool.
meanings.sent3: His constant eating makes him the best food critic.
meanings.sent4: The art of cooking is a delightful gerund.
meanings.sent5: Running is a great way to stay healthy.

meanings.definition: A gerund phrase consists of a gerund plus any modifiers or complements.
meanings.sent1: Swimming in the ocean is my favorite activity.
meanings.sent2: She loves reading books before bedtime.
meanings.sent3: His passion for painting walls surprises everyone.
meanings.sent4: The joy of dancing under the stars is unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: Playing with puppies brings immense joy to children.
